content: For instance definitions in fsh, does anyone know how to implement base64? For example in DocumentReference datatype in DocumentReference.content.attachment.data, attempting to set it to #VGVzdCBQYXRpZW50IFN1bW1hcnk, "VGVzdCBQYXRpZW50IFN1bW1hcnk", or #{VGVzdCBQYXRpZW50IFN1bW1hcnk} will all result in failure (VGVzdCBQYXRpZW50IFN1bW1hcnk is a sample base64 string BTW)

@Jason Chan -- it looks like your base64 string is missing an = sign at the end of it. If you use "VGVzdCBQYXRpZW50IFN1bW1hcnk=", it works correctly. See: https://fshschool.org/FSHOnline/#/share/35tnIgp
@Chris Moesel Thank you so much! got it working!
